id.faq_a1: Ya, kami menawarkan model berlangganan SaaS (Software as a Service) yang fleksibel. Anda dapat memilih tagihan bulanan atau tahunan (hemat hingga 20%). Harga disesuaikan dengan paket fitur yang Anda butuhkan.
id.faq_a2: Keamanan adalah prioritas utama kami. Kami menggunakan enkripsi SSL 256-bit standar perbankan untuk semua transmisi data. Server kami dilindungi firewall berlapis dan backup otomatis.
id.faq_q3: Apakah tersedia layanan uji coba gratis?
id.faq_a3: Tentu saja! Anda dapat mencoba seluruh fitur CRUDWorks secara gratis selama 14 hari tanpa komitmen apapun. Tidak perlu kartu kredit untuk mendaftar.
id.faq_a4: Tim support kami yang berdedikasi tersedia 24/7 untuk membantu Anda melalui Live Chat, email, atau telepon.
id.faq_q5: Apakah bisa integrasi dengan software lain?
id.faq_a5: Ya, CRUDWorks memiliki API terbuka (Open API) yang memungkinkan integrasi mudah dengan berbagai software pihak ketiga seperti CRM, E-commerce, dan sistem perbankan perusahaan Anda.
id.faq_q6: Bagaimana jika saya ingin berhenti berlangganan?
id.faq_a6: Anda dapat membatalkan langganan kapan saja melalui dashboard akun Anda. Tidak ada kontrak jangka panjang yang mengikat, dan Anda tetap dapat mengekspor seluruh data Anda sebelum akun ditutup.

en.faq_q1: Is there a monthly subscription fee?
en.faq_a1: Yes, we offer a flexible SaaS (Software as a Service) subscription model. You can choose monthly or annual billing (save up to 20%). Pricing is adjusted to the feature package you need.
en.faq_a2: Security is our top priority. We use banking-standard 256-bit SSL encryption for all data transmission. Our servers are protected by layered firewalls and automated backups.
en.faq_a3: Absolutely! You can try all CRUDWorks features for free for 14 days with no commitment. No credit card required to sign up.
en.faq_a4: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you via Live Chat, email, or phone.
en.faq_q5: Can it integrate with other software?
en.faq_a5: Yes, CRUDWorks has an Open API that allows easy integration with various third-party software such as CRM, E-commerce, and your company's banking systems.
en.faq_q6: What if I want to cancel my subscription?
en.faq_a6: You can cancel your subscription at any time via your account dashboard. There are no binding long-term contracts, and you can still export all your data before the account is closed.
